text_block_list.text: ―Umanest continental frontier "Demon King's Castle".

Oh no, I ate, I ate! I knew I'd eat seed 
rice risotto with my future on the line!

But what to do with ……? Elle and Glass or…… If only another horse 
girl didn't come, this Golshi-sama would have been under my 
heaven for a long time…

Let's take care of this before they come barging into this 
castle. Hey, General A and General B!
You wanted to see me, demon king?

It's not "Demon King. Make no mistake. 
It's "King Horse", "King Horse"!

Hey, you two, go and butt-fuck fighter Elle and healer Glass and 
send them back to their own worlds!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I see. The Demon King…… No, the Uma King is Golshi-senpai! 
If that is the source of the trouble, we must 
defeat her as soon as possible.
Oh-ho-ho! Not so fast, you two!

You will be defeated right here. You will be defeated right here 
by King Rayjo, the first-rate general in the service of King Uma.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
King…… Ray Joe! Is this a demon tribe 
created on the model of King-chan?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Evil Ray Joe…… If you leave something 
alone, it's going to ruin itself. ……
That's rude! I will not be ruined!

Besides, there's another Demon General. Here, 
look at this. Look at this skyline: ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ―! Suddenly there is a dark cloud over…… Is this ……?

Oh-ho! Some demons can control the weather at will. The other 
demon general is this kid!

Hmmm… I am the dark druid "Bloody Sky". I am not Seiun, so please 
don't make a mistake～.
Come on, fresh-blood-colored clouds! Dye the world in bright red!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Nah, something about the sky color 
just got creepy deuce! Oh, wow. ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Watch out, Elle! Let's see what tricks you come up with next: ……!
Hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, hmmm… ……!
I mean, this is all I can do! Or just change the color of the sky.
But you see, I've got a lot of atmosphere. So, King, you're on!

Yeah, yeah, another throw in the middle! Always always always 
you…… …… Kohon, then I'll take it from here.

Come on, Elle. I invite you to a wonderful world. The magic of 
illusion "King's World"!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Que ……? Where is this place?

As you can see, we are in the ballroom of the royal castle. 
Daughters compete with each other not in combat, but in dance.

Will you dance with me, Miss Elle? 
Can't you at least social dance?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Na, na, na, what desu, that! Elle's specialty dance is ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Here, Deuce! Mambo, mambo! Cha-cha-cha-cha! Woo!

What's that? You are so peculiar, you are like a snow monkey. 
You're always blabbing about 'the world's strongest' and such, 
but now you're moving ……
The world sucks!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Geez! World Saiitai!
That's right. You are the world saithe. Say, Say, Say: ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Say no more, say no more.…… It's no good…… anymore.…… Elle can't 
get…… back on her feet. ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Pull yourself together, Elle! Don't let 
the illusions get the better of you!

Ho ho ho! If Elle can't fight, the only thing left is the healer. 
We'll never be able to compete.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
…… so…… Unlike Elle, I cannot fight 
with my fists. At best I can ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
The only thing to do is to clear this 
dark cloud - to clear it away.

What ……! This magical surge of energy is ……! Ms. Glass, what on 
earth are you doing?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
If evil covers the world, I, as a healer, will exorcise its 
darkness. Sacred - with the thunder of angels.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Elle is not the only one who has grown tougher 
in the face of repeated battles!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Clean judgment, descend! Healer #9 Top Magic "Angel Thunder" ！！！！！

Oh, ah ……? Both the fresh blood-colored clouds and the ballroom 
fizzled out in an instant and ……!
Pull back! Skye, retreat!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Glass…… awesome desu ……! You have 
finally mastered "Angel Thunder"!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: With that magic, even the King of Uma will be swept away!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Is it "The Phantom Blessed …… looking down from above the clouds, 
with its innate lightning ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Que ……? What's up Death, Glass?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
No, it's nothing. Let's go. To the decisive battlefield, beneath 
the castle of King Uma!
